item.title: Almost Finished components
item.description: PoppyGo One PoppyGo One is a Hugo Theme. Development Requirement npm Setup npm install Create a new tailwind.css To compile a new tailwind css file run the following command: npm run prod Release management Prerequisites Write access to the repositoty Github CLI npm make New release To create a new release set a new version in .
